title: Scanning continous files
body:
Short and Basic.

I hop onto my PC update league, the patch is perfect everything is running.
I then hop onto my laptop to update league, it reaches 99% until a pop up comes up saying the update failed. From there it stayed at 99%. I closed the launcher reopened it. It starts updating again but at 33%, from there it's been continuously scanning files. Highest I've let it go up to is around 15K.

I have tried restarting and shutdown before. Not sure what the issue is. I hope leaving it over night wil get the patch done and over with. It's just been scanning files continuously.
